title: St Paul's late progres upon earth, about a divorce 'twixt Christ and the Church of Rome, by reason of her dissolutenes and excesses. With the causes of these present commotions 'twixt the Pope, and the princes of Italy. A new way of invention agreeable to the times. Published by James Howell, Armig.
author: Pallavicino, Ferrante, 1615-1644.
publisher: Printed by Richard Heron for Matthew Walbancke at Grayes-Inne Gate,
